recipesJson.name: McDriveThru Apple Pie #DevelopedPie #Developed
recipesJson.author: s2k
recipesJson.description:
The only thing missing here is the smell of exhaust while you wait in line....Enjoy

BIG thanks to Developed for doing this again!

This recipe was tested and designed on the Wasp Nano RDA, choked down 3/4 closed w/added stubby 510 drip tip, 24g round wire .70ohms at 30W and the Moonshot RTA at .56ohms at 42 watts
